Sentencas: LSGM (La1-xSrxGa1-yMg gamma O3-delta) powders of four different compositions (x, y=0.1 or 0.2) (a symbolic system such as LSGM9191 for x = 0.1 and y = 0.1 or LSGM9182 for x = 0.1 and y = 0.2 is used hereafter) were synthesized using the GNP (glycine nitrate process) as the electrolyte material of the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (IT-SOFC).
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallates as the electrolyte for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: They were then calcined at 1000 degrees C for 2 h, compacted into a disc or a rod, and sintered at 1400 degrees C for 4 h in preparation for structural, electrical and thermomechanical characterizations.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallates as the electrolyte for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The reactivity of the LSGM with the cathode material of LSM (La0.85Sr0.15MnO3) or with the anode material of Ni-YSZ was analyzed by sintering an LSGM/LSM, LSGM/NiO or LSGM/YSZ powder mixture at 1400 degrees C for 4 h and then searching for possible reaction products in its XRD pattern.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallates as the electrolyte for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The sinters of LSGM9191, LSGM9182 and LSGM8282 consisted of a single LSGM phase.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallates as the electrolyte for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: On the other hand, the sinter of LSGM8291 contained the second phases of LaSrGa3O7 and LaSrGaO4 as well in addition to the main LSGM phase.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallates as the electrolyte for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of LSGM8282 (0.105 S cm(-1) at 800 degrees C) turned out to be the highest among those of the four LSGMs and more than twice as high as that of YSZ (similar to 0.045 S cm(-1)).
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallates as the electrolyte for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The linear thermal expansion coefficient was measured to be 12.1 x 10(-6) K-1 for LSGM8282 which was very close to that of LSM (11.7 x 10(-6) K-1).
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallates as the electrolyte for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The phase stability of LSGM8282 in contact with LSM was fairly good.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallates as the electrolyte for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: LSGM8282, however, reacted quite extensively with Ni-YSZ.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallates as the electrolyte for IT-SOFC
Preparation and characterization of strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallates as the electrolyte for IT-SOFC
Preparation and characterization of strontium and magnesium doped lanthanum gallates as the electrolyte for IT-SOFC
